|desc_6      = After some time has passed, becomes immune to DMG and causes large and small lances to continuously rain down from above, with each large and small lance dealing '''100% ATK''' and '''20% ATK''' respectively as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. To interrupt this attack, the player must travel through the ocean current nearby and use the [[Sword of Narzissenkreuz (Quest)|Sword of Narzissenkreuz]]'s ability against Narzissenkreuz.
